category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TWP.ProcessLine.Text
preference.preference_description: Defines the text that is displayed as header of a process line in the Time Way Planner view of the Manufacturing Process Planner application. Valid Values: legend - Any string that is displayed as it is entered. property-name - The internal name of the property on the process line. The property-name string is replaced by the property display name, for example, the value Name: [bl_rev_object_name] is displayed as Name: Object Name.
